title: Social Network Utilization in Higher Education: Collaborative Learning and Online Communities of Practice Construction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Experience with e-Learning Platforms and Understanding of Collaborative Learning
context.additional_context: A course enhancing collaboration learning via social networks and online communities of practice for current professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can establish collaborative learning project plans using social network tools.
Learners can apply effective communication and knowledge-sharing strategies in online communities of practice.
Learners can design learning activities using social networks even in smartphone-based, resource-constrained technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
